overview:
Benjamin Reece is the CEO & â€œproduct visionaryâ€ of Kinio, a video publishing, monetization, and distribution platform.

In 2008, Benjamin founded the film & digital production studio, Deltree where he produced for Coca-Cola, Converse, Purina, NYC Ballet, Salesforce & a host of other global brands. As Interactive Strategist, Benjamin led the web division at the Louisiana Public Health Institute after five years of project management, UX & development experience. In his spare time, he has created the award winning & viral web series, “Fifty People, One Question.
